name: Adept
description: A hybrid class that favours all but magic. Can wield equipment of both the rogue and knight.

name: Arcanic
description: A deadly rogue of Annwn trained in lost arcane techniques. It is immune to arcane magic and can wield equipment of the rogue.

name: Archdruid
description: A powerful magician skilled in the art of taming beasts.  It is naturally strong against the powers of light and dark and can wield equipment of both the rogue and mage.

name: Archmage
description: A powerful mage who further favours magic over all else. Can wield archistaffs and robes.

name: Atlas Vanguard
description: A stalwart holy warrior of Lyonesse that is well versed in methods of ward and survivability. It is immune to holy magic and can wield equipment of the warrior.

name: Battlemage
description: A very skilled magic user that can cast spells repetitively. It has a good chance casting spells for free and can wield equipment of both the knight and mage.

name: Battle Master
description: A highly skilled warrior that favours attack power over all else. This class can wield any weapon or piece of equipment found.

name: Blademaster
description: A very skilled weapon master of Avalon. It has a good chance of eluding defeat in battle and can wield equipment of both the rogue and knight.

name: Centurion
description: A warrior trained in the art of defensive techniques. This class favours skills that allow them to outlast their opponents.

name: Conjuror
description: An alternative version of the Sorcerer class. Purchase this class to support the game and gain an alternative sprite.

name: Dragon Knight
description: One who rides with the most powerful of dragons.   It is naturally strong against dragon magic and can wield equipment of both the knight and mage.

name: Dragoon
description: One who rides with dragons. Can wield any piece of equipment they choose.

name: Druid
description: A powerful magician skilled in the art of taming beasts. Can wield any piece of equipment they choose.

name: Freyr
description: One of the highest order of Nothren warriors and valkyries. It is immune to dragon magic, has special bonds with beasts, and can wield equipment of the warrior.

name: Frost Mage
description: A mage of the Frozenguard that has mastered the arts of the cold.

name: Gaia
description: A knight of nature and balance who has truly mastered the powers of the earth below. It is immune to earthen magic and can wield any piece of equipment they choose.

name: Grand Mystic
description: A mystical fighter of Annwn that mixes magic and dexterity. It can dodge attacks more effectively as damage is taken and can wield equipment of both the rogue and mage.

name: Ifrit
description: A knight of smoke and ash who has truly mastered the powers of the flame. It is immune to fire magic and can wield any piece of equipment they choose.

name: Knight
description: A fighting class that favours defense and HP over magic and skills. Can wield heavier armor and weapons.

name: Legionnaire
description: A soldier of the Earthen Legion that has mastered the arts of the ground below them.

name: Leviathan
description: A knight of tide and ice who has truly mastered the powers of the seas. It is immune to water magic and can wield any piece of equipment they choose.

name: Mage
description: A skilled individual who favours magic over strength. Can wield staves and robes.

name: Majestic
description: A royal servant to the kingdom of Annwn, skilled in elemental offense. Can wield any piece of equipment they choose.

name: Majistrate
description: An elite force of the kingdom of Annwn, skilled in elemental offense.  It is naturally strong against arcane magic and can wield equipment of both the knight and rogue

name: Mystic
description: A hybrid class that mixes dexterity and magic. Can wield equipment of both the rogue and mage.

name: Nekromancer
description: An exiled magus of Avalon that utilizes the dark powers of the fallen to overcome its foes. It is immune to dark magic and can wield the equipment of the mage.

name: Paladin
description: An elite warrior who decides those who may fall and those who may live in battle. Can wield heavier armor and weapons and practices elemental attacks.

name: Phalanx
description: An alternative version of the Centurion class. Purchase this class to support the game and gain an alternative sprite.

name: Rogue
description: A fighter well versed in various weaponry. Can wield daggers, bows, and some swords.

name: Royal Guard
description: A fighting class that favours defense and HP over magic and skills. Can wield heavier armor and weapons.

name: Rune Knight
description: An elite warrior who decides those who may fall and those who may live in battle. Can wield heavier armor and weapons and practices elemental attacks.

name: Scorcher
description: A rogue of the Inferno Knights. This fighting class can learn rare fire magic.

name: Sorcerer
description: An even more powerful mage who practices magic of dark and light. Can wield archistaffs and robes.

name: Spellsword
description: A hybrid class that mixes defense and magic. Can wield equipment of both the knight and mage.

name: Storm Knight
description: A soldier of Stormforce that has mastered the arts of the sky above them.

name: Taranis
description: A knight of lightning and thunder who has truly mastered the powers of the skies. It is immune to lightning magic and can wield any piece of equipment they choose.

name: Thief
description: A tricky fighting class that favours speed and damage over defense. Can wield daggers, bows, and some swords.

name: Wanderer
description: A fighter well versed in various weaponry. Can wield daggers, bows, and some swords.

name: Warlock
description: A powerful mage who further favours magic over all else. Can wield archistaffs and robes.

name: Warlord
description: An alternative version of the Battle Master class. Purchase this class to support the game and gain an alternative sprite.

name: Warrior
description: A melee class who favours physical attacks and brute strength over magic. Can wield most weapons and armor.
